metadata.title: CVE-2017-7541 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The brcmf_cfg80211_mgmt_tx function indrivers/net/wireless/broadcom/brcm80211/brcmfmac/cfg80211.c in the Linuxkernel before 4.12.3 allows local users to cause a denial of service(buffer overflow and system crash) or possibly gain privileges via acrafted NL80211_CMD_FRAME Netlink packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19

No subscription required
